snippet: Vincent Gallo has been working hard to keep his 2010 film off screen, leaving the Whitney Biennial hanging.
abstract: Vincent Gallo continues to work to keep his 2010 film Promises Written in Water from being shown, despite it being on the program of the 2012 Whitney Biennial; Gallo's reputation as a narcissist and provocateur leave many to wonder whether refusal to distribute the work is an act of self-sabotage or a principled stand against the establishment.
lead_paragraph: Vincent Gallo has been working hard to keep his 2010 film off screen, leaving the Whitney Biennial hanging.

headline.seo: Vincent Gallo Keeps ‘Promises Written in Water’ Off Screens
headline.main: R.I.P. ‘Promises,’ It Was Nice Knowing You
headline.print_headline: R.I.P. ‘Promises,’ It Was Nice Knowing You
